title: Goblins Night
summary:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”

title: From Goblin to Goblin God
summary: Lin Tian reincarnated as a goblin, the lowest rank of magical creatures, and initially, he had to lie low. Later, he fully unleashed the true nature of a goblin. Blessed with many offspring, the more children he has, the stronger he becomes thanks to the blessings from the gods!

title: Counterattacking System Available At The Grand Ascension Stage
summary: Jiang Li, after crossing over, discovered he possessed no cheat abilities so he had no choice but to diligently cultivate. Five hundred years later, he became the strongest in the Nine Provinces. Suddenly, a system appeared, claiming it could help the host go from the Qi Refining stage to becoming the number one in the Nine Provinces. Jiang Li stared at the first task, lost in thought. “Host, please defeat your cousin (at the sixth level of Qi Refining).” “Your system seems to have quite a delay, doesn’t it?”

title: Let Me Enjoy the Extra Life
The Possessed Prodigy Actor
summary: Actor Kim Hyunsu one day came to be able to dream the dreams of the dead, and those were not ordinary dreams. It is the story of an actor who, based on the dreams of the dead, comes to give performances as if possessed!

title: Fall in Love or Die
summary:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)

title: The Villain of the Octagon
summary: I, Yuuto Hatano, love the bishoujo game "Houkago no Flare Story" and have played it over and over again. I thought, "If the world were like this, going to school would be fun..." Then, when I woke up the next day… I had entered the game world! And not as the protagonist, but as the villain, Kanji Aku! I had hoped to do all sorts of things with the heroines I admired, but as a villain, their affection for me was at rock bottom. With this, conquering them is nothing but a dream within a dream... Moreover, if I choose the wrong option, what awaits me is death!! As a villain with the lowest stats and lowest affection level, I must overcome deadly choices, conquer the heroines, and escape this world—Go, Kanji Aku!

title: I Was Mistaken As a Monstrous Genius
Starting As The God Of Wealth, Taming Billions Of Divine Pets!
summary:
The apocalypse game swept across the globe and merged with the real world, causing the collapse of order. In his previous life, Ye Xiao devoted everything to elevating his fiancée, Liu Ruyan, to the pinnacle of power, only to have his heart literally ripped out by her on the day of their engagement and transplanted into her male best friend. Reborn into a new life, Ye Xiao resolves to ascend the throne alone. Before the game closes its recharge portal, he spends billions of his fortune to switch to a god-level profession.

---

**Original Webtoon**: 
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/24688)

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: Please Take Care
summary: Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!

title: From Six to Sovereignty: The Girl Who Ruled
summary: Tracy was only 16 when she was sentenced to death. Unloved and unwanted, she died as a forgotten side character in someone else's story. But fate gives her a chance to write her own story as the protagonist this time by sending her back into her six-year-old body. This time, Tracy knows every betrayal coming her way and refuses to be a mere stepping stone again. If survival means becoming the villain, she'll gladly embrace the darkness. Now, let the real story begin.

title: I Become a fool when it comes to my Daughter
summary:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.

title: Light of Arad: Forerunner
summary:
Summoned to purify the corruption spreading across Arad...?

Jinseong, a player who dedicated his life to "Dungeon & Fighter," is summoned to Arad by the transcendent Nemer and given the mission of becoming the Claw Master.

“You shall become the Claw Master and guide the blade through rightful trials.”

"I'll become the Claw Master or whatever it takes. I will survive in this Arad!"

Will DFO veteran Jinseong successfully complete his mission and return to the real world? The story of the Dark Knight Jinseong's quest to prevent the destruction of Arad begins!

title: I’m Stuck On The Same Day For A Thousand Years
summary:
Wu Chen transmigrated to a new world, Got trapped on the day of July 7, 2020, Constantly reincarnating! He used to indulge himself doing all sorts of evil things while running wild in despair, but every new day, everything would start all over again. In this way, he has been reincarnated for a thousand years, and on a new day, the sun rose as usual.
——The time is: July 8, 2020

title: She Becomes Glamorous After The Engagement Annulment
Mood Disorder
summary:
[From the Same Studio as the Manhua "Girl and Science"]

Everybody is crazy except me. But is it a misfortune to be sane in a crazy world?

title: Taming the Beasts With Multi-Pregnancy System
Romance in the Beast World
summary: This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them. That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power...?

title: Kissing Is a Violation of Contract
summary:
"Be my girlfriend."
Jae-hyun, a selfish tycoon, and Dan-bi, who has nothing but confidence to rely on.
They are entangled in a rainbow(?) relationship!
Will this 'contractual love affair' end safely?

title: Blood Demon Reincarnation
summary:
Kang San is a bottom-tier anker with neither talent, ability, or skill. Misfortune follows him until a divine messenger appears before him one day. 

"You wee the Blood Demon in your past life." 

To atone for his past life’s sins, he must endure harsh trials. But in return, he will receive immense rewards. 

Can a weak F-rank tanker drenched in blood change his fate?

title: Beauty and the Beasts
summary:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?

title: I randomly have a new career every week
summary: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: Spoiled Fairytale
summary:
Late spring—on a street unusually damp and buzzing with life.
Seohee, worn out and withering under her parents’ contempt and neglect, finds herself entangled with a libertine infamous for his promiscuous private life.

“Ah. I didn’t really plan to go this far….”
“……”
“I’ll be spending the night.”

A man who freely crosses the line between kindness and cruelty.
A man who tosses around love carelessly.
A man who mocks fairytales, calling them hollow illusions—Joo Taebaek.

Wrapped in all things vivid and dazzling, he crashes into Seohee like a violent wave, shaking her to the core.

“Alright. I’ll keep your secret.”
“…Really?”
“In exchange, let me screw you—loud and wild.”

A filthy act of rebellion.
A fleeting moment of euphoria.

“No need to overthink it.”

She thought that if she assimilated with him, she might at least share in his counterfeit love.
So, she willingly threw herself into a fleeting flame.

Was she really insane? Who taught her how to seduce a man like him?

“Um… it’s over now, right?”

Seohee slightly lowered her head toward a completely dazed Taebaek.

“I have to go before midnight.”

So then—
Who really got swept up in the fire?

title: Elegant Desire
summary: What’s the chance of running into your first love again after twelve years? This is exactly what happens to Solhui after attending her frenemy’s bridal shower. What’s more? Her first love is having an affair with a married woman. But that’s not all. She meets him and the woman again when she starts a viola lesson with a new student.

title: Traces of the Moon
summary:
While on his way home from an interview, unemployed, unmotivated, jaded 18-year-old Inumata Shinogi encounters the beautiful lady and evil spirit Yaergnacht Finsternis. She demands him to either marry her or die on the spot. He must command the battle against enemies of humanity, the apostles of God (Highlanders), and save the world with his wife!!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/2550912965944469925)

title: A Fresh Concubine
summary:
A 3,900-year-old god became human overnight, losing her divine powers, her dao, and her humanity. It was the king of Joseon, Yi Hul, who had stolen her peaches and fled.

With nowhere to go, Horang offers to let her stay in his palace,

Believing that she will end his long drought, he grants her the favor...

title: I became the stepmother who caused my favorite character to fall into darkness
summary: Akari, who possessed the body of her favorite character's stepmother. While she was delighted to see her beloved character in their adorable childhood up close, she realized that she herself is the stepmother 'Elena,' the person responsible for causing the character to fall into darkness. Determined to avoid the character's descent into darkness and make them happy, Akari faces numerous challenges as the misdeeds of Elena before the possession come back to haunt her. Will she be able to make her favorite character happy?

title: Evolution Begins With A Big Tree
summary: One minute, he was choking on water, and the next, he found himself in a canyon and turned into a willow tree! Before he could reconcile with this new sad reality, the world decided to throw him another curveball. With the return of spirit energy, every living thing started to mutate, and his life was soon turned into a game of survival. Luckily, he was gifted with the ability of infinite evolution. But was it really a blessing? Or was it also a curse in disguise?

title: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!
summary: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.

title: A Lonely Princess Falls In Love With A Misanthropic Emperor
summary:
In her homeland, Princess Oriana of the Kingdom of Lifarl is hated and feared for her heterochromatic “demon eyes.” For all of her eighteen years, she has been imprisoned in the highest room of a tower, suffering neglect and abuse from her parents.

One day, her father offers her as a tribute to Emperor Radolfas of the Reagald Empire, a ruler feared for his “cold justice” in relentlessly eliminating threats to the empire. To gain his favor, her father lies, claiming Oriana’s eyes are the fabled “Goddess’s Blessing.”

While Oriana worries about the falsehood being discovered, Radolfas, upon seeing her, abruptly declares she will be made empress. Then, with icy indifference, he adds:

“Once you bear me an heir, your role will be over.”

title: The Bottom-Feeder Scavenger’s Revenge
summary:
After his sister's death, Row, who was said to be a freeloader, becomes an explorer to investigate the cause of his sister's death. 

When he nearly loses his life in the dungeon, he acquires the ability to disassemble monster corpses, supplies, and skills. Row becomes stronger by disassembling various things. 

And the mystery of his sister's death slowly begins to unravel...

title: The Princess in The Henhouse
summary:
In the Fight Empire, where strength and beauty were valued above all else, even the princesses led armies and spent their days in battle. This is a story of one particular day in the lives of two princesses born into this nation.

[Part of the 10th anniversary Jump+ One-shot collection](https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/web_pages/2019/)

title: Blade of Retribution
summary: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.

title: Legend of Star General
summary: A spinoff centering on Lu Bu Fengxian.

title: Return of the Legend
summary:
New adaptation of the novel.  
  
The story is staged in the distant future within our own Milky Way Galaxy, approximately in the late 36th century. A portion of the galaxy is filled with terraformed worlds inhabited by interstellar traveling human beings. For 150 years two mighty space powers have intermittently warred with each other: the Galactic Empire and the Free Planets Alliance. Within the Galactic Empire, based on mid 19th century Prussia, an ambitious military genius, Reinhard von Müsel, later conferred Reinhard von Lohengramm, is rising to power. He is driven by the desire to free his sister Annerose, who was taken by the Kaiser as a concubine. Later, he wants not only to end the corrupt Goldenbaum dynasty but also to defeat the Free Planets Alliance and to unify the whole galaxy under his rule.  
  
In the Free Planets Alliance Star Fleet is another genius, Yang Wen Li. He originally aspired to become a historian through a military academy, and joined the tactical division only out of need for tuition money. He was rapidly promoted to an admiral because he demonstrated excellence in military strategy in a number of decisive battles and conflicts. He becomes the archrival of Reinhard, though they highly respect one another. Unlike Reinhard he is better known for his underdog victories and accomplishments in overcoming seemingly impossible odds and mitigating casualties and damages due to military operations.  
As a historian, Yang often predicts the motives behind his enemies and narrates the rich history of his world and comments on it. One of his famous quotes is: "There are few wars between good and evil; most are between one good and another good."  
  


---

title: We Got Ourselves Stuck Inside an Adult Fantasy Novel
Will You Marry Me Under Contract, Your Highness?
summary: Jenesia, a brilliant sorcerer, was murdered after witnessing an affair between her fiancé and her best friend. With her final breath, Jenesia managed to use her magical powers to turn back time. Reliving her past, will Jenesia finally be able to find happiness?

title: Till Divorce Do Us Part!
summary: Carl van Hellsing has vowed to hunt down the vampire Elliot for eternity. But, that's exactly what Elliot wants.

title: The Reincarnated Cop Who Strikes With Wealth
summary: I was reincarnated as the son of a conglomerate leader. But I’m going to be a cop.

title: Beneath the Peach Tree
summary:
1. The Conditions for Paradise  
Two adult women figuring out the boundaries in their relationship–is too much freedom a bad thing?  
  
2. Beyond the Stars  
Chapter 1 prequel. It's about how Sarina and Sumi first became more than friends.  
  
3. Bathed in Sunlight Filtering Through the Trees  
A continuation of Sarina and Sumi's relationship.  
  
4. 20-Year-Old Girl x 30-Year-Old Maiden  
About an art prep school teacher who feels like she can't compare to her new 20-year-old girlfriend.  
  
5. The Opposite of "Seme" is "Protector"  
Chapter 4 sequel. Keiko wants to take things further. There are two more stories in this series in the A Lapis Lazuli Blue Dream collection.  
  
6. We're Aiming for Love Now  
It's about two women who love each other just as they are.  
  
7. Peach Taste  
A girl struggles to convince the object of her affections to take her seriously.  
  
8. Princess Sakura, Showered With Blossoms  
Set in Japan's past. A knight protects her princess.

title: The Genius Mage Who Uses His Fists
summary:
Zed, a former MMA champion, wakes up in the body of a scrawny prisoner in a fantasy world. Reborn as a member of the once-feared Arahan family, he’s trapped inside a brutal magical internment camp. With no spells at his disposal, Zed trains his body to become a living weapon. He escapes the prison with his only ally Riu, a sharp-witted inmate. Now hunted by both a ruthless warden and a noble house, Zed must fight his way to freedom only with his fists. Can a man with no magic change the rules of a world built on it?   

---

**Original Webtoon:**   
- [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=836657)
- [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12255262)   

**Official Translations:**   
- [English](https://www.webtoons.com/en/action/the-fistfighting-genius-mage/list?title_no=8018)
- [T.Chinese](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/the-fistfighting-genius-mage/list?title_no=8220)
